content: Anyone know when the issues with the Development build are likely to be resolved? Trying to get to the FHIR CCDA Implementation Guide, advertised as being here http://hl7-fhir.github.io/ccda/ccda.html

from another topic: "In preparation for the ballot in a few weeks time, I've just committed a change to the home page that introduces a new aspect to the specification, a module based view of the content. You'll find it rather obvious... but it's a work in progress, and navigation around the specification will be a little impaired for the next little while.. sorry"
the IGs are being moved out to their own place
